"Which of your phone contacts are on Facebook? Let us show you, then choose who you'd like to add as friends."

"Find Friends uploads contacts from your device and stores them on Facebook's servers where they may be used to help others search for people or to generate friend suggestions for you and others. Professional contacts may be imported but you should send invites to personal contacts only. Please send invites only to friends who will be glad to get them. Manage your invites and contacts anytime at http://fb.me/invites."
